scripts.start: concurrently "cd auth && npm start" "cd orders && npm start" "cd products && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd auth && npm run dev" "cd  orders && npm run dev" "cd products && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd auth && npm i" "cd orders && npm i" "cd products && npm i"
scripts.dasdas: concurrently "cd auth && npm i dotenv" "cd orders && npm i dotenv" "cd products && npm i dotenv"
